description: Build Session Monitoring system (Sprint 5) that allows users to view list of all active sessions, monitor agent progress in real-time, view session details with orchestrator + agents, and preview agent output files
goal: Enable users to monitor multi-agent session progress in real-time through a comprehensive UI that displays session status, agent coordination, and output files
requirements: SessionReader API to scan session directories and parse communication.json files
SessionsList component with real-time status updates and filtering
SessionDetail component showing orchestrator + agents + status
AgentCard component for individual agent status with phases and output links
OutputViewer modal for displaying agent output files (JSON/Markdown/Text)
Real-time polling with SWR (10-second refresh interval)
Status badges for not_started, in_progress, complete, blocked
Security validation to prevent directory traversal attacks
constraints: Must follow Phase 1 design specifications from dashboard-audit-v2.md
Must use SWR for real-time polling
Must use Tailwind CSS with ind-* design tokens
